studyArms.name: ALXN1840 15 mg followed by 30 mg
studyArms.description: Participants receive ALXN1840 15 mg once daily for approximately 28 days followed by titration to 30 mg once daily starting on Day 29

studyCohorts.name: Treatment experienced (Cohort 1)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for > 28 days

studyCohorts.name: Treatment naïve (Cohort 2)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for ≤ 28 days

arms.name: ALXN1840 15 mg followed by 30 mg
arms.description: Participants receive ALXN1840 15 mg once daily for approximately 28 days followed by titration to 30 mg once daily starting on Day 29

cohorts.name: Treatment experienced (Cohort 1)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for > 28 days

cohorts.name: Treatment naïve (Cohort 2)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for ≤ 28 days

epochs.name: Run-in Period
epochs.description: Day -8 to Day -1: Diet equilibration (Day -7 through Day -5) and pretreatment copper/molybdenum balance measurement (Day -4 through Day -1)

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 1
epochs.description: Day -8 to Day 9: Includes Run-in Period and initial 15 mg/day treatment with collection period

epochs.name: Outpatient Period
epochs.description: Day 9 to Day 22/23: Participants discharged from CRU, may be extended up to 14 additional days

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 2
epochs.description: Day 23 to Day 40: 15 mg/day steady state collection (Day 25-28), titration to 30 mg/day (Day 29), and 30 mg/day accumulation and steady state collection (Day 29-39)
